column1: Smoque BBQ////Came here based on the Yelp reviews and I must say
column2: the food did not disappoint! I ordered the Sliced Brisket platter with mac & cheese and baked beans. The mac and cheese was good
column4: but the brisket was amazing! It was tender and cooked to perfection. Probably some of the best brisket I've ever had (and this is coming from a girl from Alabama). I will definitely be back next time I'm in Chicago.
